short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to help TeachShare grab your existing store content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you a teacher author? With this extension, you can edit all your content directly inside of TeacherToolAI, allowing you to ideate, create, and deploy educational resources like never before! You don't need this extension to use TeacherToolAI, but if you install this extension, it lets TeacherToolAI import your content from your existing store automatically.
